title: Wearing a Jacket over your Abaya - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: that's ruling on wearing a big coat an overcoat that covers the whole body in wintertime do I have to wear my Tamar and my hijab and it has to be on the outer part of my big large coat or can I wear it inside if it hides your bone structure and it covers you nicely and neatly without revealing your body there's no problem in wearing it underneath
